sentences.sContent: Objective: To examine the relationship between cognition states and electrodermal activity(EDA) and to provide evidence for improvement of lie-detection technique.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective: To examine the relationship between cognition states and electrodermal activity(EDA) and to provide evidence for improvement of lie-detection technique.
sentences.sCn: 目的：探讨个体认知状态与皮肤电反应之间的关系，为改进测谎技术提供科学依据。
